title: RSVP = Retired Senior Volunteer Programme
creator_credit: Bob Connolly, Barry Pierce and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: The Retired Senior Volunteer Program offers retired people volunteer work with organisations who can use their expertise. This Government funded program is unique in Australia. It gives senior citizens meaningful work in retirement.
creator_credit_for_label: Bob Connolly, Barry Pierce and Tasmanian Film Corporation
